title: More diesel & petrol cargo to begin unloading tomorrow (21)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Minister of Energy Kanchana Wijesekara states that another Diesel and a Petrol cargo will commence unloading tomorrow (21).
In a tweet, he mentions that diesel have been disturbed to all fuel stations islandwide in the last 2 days and will continue distribution.
Moreover, the distribution of Petrol 92 and 95, which commenced this morning and will continue to cover all fuel stations.
Sri Lanka Football reveals 3-year plan with Qatar Football Association
